Effective Business Management During The Covid-19 Crisis

  • Posted by Hemendra Singh
  • April 8,2020

The time when the world is fighting with the fatal COVID-19 Coronavirus and its severe effects. It is required for all of us to stay at home and keep ourselves and our family safe by following government guidelines and taking all the means of safety measures.

As the CEO of The NineHertz, I have ensured the safety of my employees and team members by strictly implementing work from home (WFH) strategy. The best possible approach to continue business operations during this quarantine. The entire team has given the record-breaking productivity from WFH policy.

Due to pandemic, many businesses are on the downfall, especially small-scale IT industries. Therefore, it is the duty of global IT experts to come out and help the fellows to overcome this problem.

You may have faced some loss or may be delayed in some projects. Does your client ask for the project status and you have less workman? We, at The NineHertz, welcome all the pending projects of yours with arms open. We guarantee you the completion of the project on time and promises to maintain the coding standards.

Whether it is a mobile app development, websites or a custom business solution. I guarantee uninterrupted support, communication and development services with the aid of our highly skilled and experienced team, passionately working to cater company’s major objectives- quality service and 100% customer satisfaction.

All you need to do is share your requirements and get the project delivery in the given timeline.

Let’s start!!

Creating a Digital Elastic Workplace

Communication is key. Our team is connected digitally and we will connect with any medium you are comfortable with. From skype calls to email, our workplace is digitally well-organized.

Smart skills of our team have led to a well-organized and structured digital workplace that can be accessed by any part of the world. The team defines the definition of Digital elastic workplace.

1

Serve Customers’ Core Needs

We serve your customers’ core needs, adaptive to global and local conditions. Being transparent in operations and having expertise in various technologies helped deliver the best customer experience.

2

Establish Business Continuity

With a huge team of web and app developers, designers, UI/UX, QA and analysts, we provide on full-time, part-time, and contract basis. We ensure effective business processes and enhance business continuity plans.

3

Remote Work Experts

We have plenty of remote work experts to ensure delivering high-quality and rewarding projects. We have provided employment to a few of the experts during this pandemic. Certified and reputed experts are there to help you 24X7.

4

Elastic Collaboration

We enable our team to work with you and take part actively to assist at each phase. Since we have a large team, many experts are available to collaborate with you to boost the productivity of your business efficiently.

5

Seamless Networking

In some cases, you may feel disconnected due to a decrease in resources from your side. We will fill the gap of the networks, provide extra cloud services, ready with backup plans. Etc.so that there are zero chances for any downfall in the project submission.

6

Adaptive Security

Your ideas and credentials related to the project are safe with us. We sign NDA with our clients and have a white-collar reputation among the clients at a global level. Your project is in safe hands, as we provide 100% security and advanced tools to protect your project with various attacks.

No End To What We Can Do For You

It is not necessary that we charge for the entire project. The charges are calculated according to the efforts done by our team. From designing issues to deployment hindrances, our experts can solve every error to make your project go success. You have no idea how effectively the team works to reach the desired goal.
